Posts.Content: Lois1969 wrote: I'm 42 and recent blood work indicated that I am post-menopausal.  I started TAmoxifen in January 2011.  My oncologist said I can switch to Femara or Arimidex if I choose to.  He says there are little to no side effects from either one.  Any thoughts would be greatly appreciated.  Tamoxifen has been uneventful for me, hoping the next "drug of choice" is the same. Dx 2/11/2010, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIC, 12/24 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: After treatment now post-menopausal, treatment options? Lois1969 financegirl
